RelatedSentence: IOOF Holdings ( IFL ) will acquire SFG Australia ( ( SFW ) ) , expanding funds under management and advice by 25 % .
IOOF Holdings ( IFL ) will acquire SFG Australia ( ( SFW ) ) , expanding funds under management and advice by 25 % .
